concept.title: Runtime Resources
concept.shortdesc: Similar to runtime properties, runtime resources are values that you define in a file local to the and call from within a pipeline. But with runtime resources, you can restrict the permissions for the files to secure sensitive information. Use runtime resources to load sensitive information from files at runtime.

conbody.p: runtime resourcesoverviewYou can use runtime resources for any pipeline property that allows the use of the expression language. You can, for example, use runtime resources to represent user names and passwords, or OAuth authentication information.

To implement runtime resources, perform the following steps:
Define each runtime resource.
Use an expression in the pipeline to call a runtime resource.
